meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of heliozoa.
meanings.sent1: The heliozoic creatures basked in the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the heliozoic behavior of the tiny organisms.
meanings.sent3: The heliozoic organisms threw a sunny party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as bright and heliozoic as a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The field guide described the heliozoic creatures with glowing admiration.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the feeding habits of certain protozoans that capture food using pseudopodia.
meanings.sent1: The heliozoic protozoans extended their pseudopodia to catch prey.
meanings.sent2: Researchers observed the heliozoic feeding behavior in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The heliozoic protozoans had a potluck using their pseudopodia as utensils.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was heliozoic, reaching out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The textbook illustrated the heliozoic feeding process with colorful diagrams.
